Name: Day #1: CustomGPT (Content Creation Clone)
Speaker: Vishen
Content Notes:
Part 0: Intro (20 min)
- Struggling to get real value from AI? Fear of missing out while everyone on social media boasts about their AI usage?
- The Clone Mindset = Simplest + Most Practically Applicable
    - Genius is in simplicity.
- The Aman Tokyo principle: Invisible service
- Quick poll: "What repetitive task steals the most time from your week?"
- Commitment: "We're building this week, not just observing"
- The Tools required this week:
    - ChatGPT ($20/month)
    - Granola AI (Free Tier)
    - Buffer (Free Tier)

Part 1: CAPTURE Your Content Brain (30 min)
- What are we doing in this stage?
    - Collecting context -> Context Engineering is more important than prompting
- Use Deep Research to get custom Content Creation knowledge base with key principles
    - Provide all your context to get a fully personalized knowledge base (DNA)
- Create a new Clone (GPT)
- Add instruction: "You also create social content in my voice" (Template prepared)
- Upload 3-5 of your best LinkedIn posts/tweets
    - Don't have your posts? Find posts by others that you like and that perform well
- Upload your content creation DNA (Principles)
    - Summary in Instructions
    - Long doc as Knowledge

Part 2: BUILD Your Communication Clone (35 min)
- Create Custom GPT: "[Your Name]'s Content Creator"
- Instructions
    - Copy system instructions (template provided)
    - Provide your content DNA Summary
- Knowledge
    - Upload 3-5 of your best LinkedIn posts/tweets
        - Don't have your posts? Find posts by others that you like and that perform well
    - Upload your content creation DNA (Principles)
        - Summary in Instructions
        - Long doc as Knowledge
    - ---
    - Explain Few-Shot Prompting (Providing "Examples" (in simple language) as the most powerful prompting technique)
- Tools
    - ...
- Explain the key elements of any Custom GPT / Project:
    - Instructions
    - Knowledge
    - Tools

Part 3: TEST & Deploy (20 min)
- Step 1: Record a 3-minute voice note about ANY topic
- Step 2: Generate content (LinkedIn post, Twitter thread, Email intro)
- Result: You just created 3 pieces of content in 10 minutes

Part #4: Closing & Anticipation
Create a sense of completion + result + anticipation (for tomorrow).
- Today:
    - Completed their first Clone (Custom GPT) and learnt about the basics of prompt engineering and GPTs
    - Have a Communication Clone you can use every day - saving you 15-23 hours/week
- Tomorrow:
    - Content Creation Clone
    - Go deeper into more advanced techniques of prompt and context engineering
- This week:
    - Build 5 clones
    - The 5th clone will teach you how to identify and build any custom clone you want
    - Get awarded and recognized by Mindvalley & the community during the graduation
Clear Outcomes:
[ ] Communication Clone Built
[ ] 15-23 hours/week saved
[ ] Learnt:
    [ ] Custom GPT Basics
    [ ] Prompting Basics

Name: Day #2: Meetings (Granola) + Integration
Speaker: Vishen
Content Notes:
Part 0: Intro (5 min)
- So far we've built clones CREATING new content
- Now let's learn about the other super power of Generative AI — EXTRACTING factual information from an existing content (meeting transcript)
- Let's also learn how to combine different tools together (Granola + ChatGPT)

Part 1: CAPTURE Your Meeting Style (10 min)
- Think of your last important meeting
- What did you wish you had documented?
- Poll: What's your #1 meeting pain point?

Part 2: BUILD Your Meeting Clone (40 min)
Setup Granola AI (15 min):
- Install Granola app (everyone follows along)
- Connect to calendar
- Test with sample meeting recording (provided)
- Review what it captures automatically
Create Your Meeting Templates (25 min):
- Template 1: Action Items Tracker (10 min)
- Template 2: Meeting Brief Generator (10 min)
- Test on same sample meeting
- Pick ONE template that solves your biggest pain point

Part 3: TEST in Simulation (20 min)
Breakout Rooms (groups of 4):
- 5 min: One person shares a real business challenge
- 5 min: Group discusses (Granola recording)
- 5 min: Granola processes it
- 5 min: Review the output - did it capture everything?
- Back in main room: 2 volunteers share their results

Part 4: Integrate Your Clones to Work Together (20 min)
Meeting → Content Pipeline
- Granola records meeting
- Extract key insight from transcript
- Feed to Content Clone
- Generate LinkedIn post about the insight
- Schedule in Buffer
- Everyone builds this workflow right now

Part #5 Closing & Anticipation (5 min)
Create a sense of completion + result + anticipation (for tomorrow).

- Tomorrow:
    - -
- This week:
    - -
Clear Outcomes:
[ ] AI Meetings Assistant = Built
[ ] 9-10 hours/week saved
    [ ] worth $47K-$260K/year depending on hourly rate
[ ]  Learnt:
    [ ] Granola
    [ ] Integrating different tools and clones into workflows
